LanguageData.WNA_AdvArsenal.label: advanced arsenal
LanguageData.WNA_AdvArsenal.description: study some published literatures of WHR and gain some insights of their more advanced arsenal. WNA - Whelingnorther Alliance

WNA_AdvArsenal.generalRules.rulesStrings.li: subject->innovation's path
subject_story->unveiled simple truths behind complex phenomena
subject_story->simplified the intricate to make way for practical applications
subject_story->harnessed basic principles to achieve remarkable feats
subject_gerund->streamlining the essence of discovery
subject->building blocks of progress
subject_story->laid the groundwork for monumental leaps forward

subject_story->cultivated a garden of knowledge, ripe with potential
subject_story->nurtured the roots of change with care and foresight
subject_gerund->sowing the future with today’s discoveries
subject->the ripple of curiosity
subject_story->set forth waves of inquiry that echoed through time
subject_story->dropped pebbles of innovation into the pond of knowledge
subject_story->watched as one question led to another, expanding the circle of understanding
subject_gerund->casting stones to create waves of progress
subject->the alchemy of progress
subject_story->merged disparate disciplines to unlock new realms of possibility
subject_story->turned the impossible into the inevitable through sheer ingenuity
subject_story->crafted solutions that reshaped the understanding of what's achievable
subject_gerund->blending science and magic into the fabric of reality
subject->the tapestry of discovery

LanguageData.WNA_BaseDefense.label: basic defense structure
LanguageData.WNA_BaseDefense.description: unusual techniques that can be used to build your colony harder to handle. WNA - Whelingnorther Alliance
